Class Page

ui.Page
Direct Known Subclasses:

  • Field Details

    • input

      protected static final Scanner input
      A shared Scanner instance for reading user input.

    • user

      The user associated with this page.

  • Constructor Details

    • Page

      public Page(User user)
      Constructs a Page with the specified user.
      Parameters:
      user - the user associated with this page

  • Method Details

    • display

      public void display()
      Displays the page, including the header and menu, and handles user actions. The method runs in a loop until the user chooses to log out.

    • displayMenu

      public int displayMenu()
      Displays the menu options and handles user input to select an option.
      Returns:
      the user's menu choice

    • getUser

      public User getUser()
      Returns the user associated with this page.
      Returns:
      the user

    • promptCRN

      public String promptCRN()
      Prompts the user to enter a CRN (Course Reference Number).
      Returns:
      the entered CRN

    • promptUserId

      public String promptUserId()
      Prompts the user to enter a user ID or email.
      Returns:
      the entered user ID or email

    • promptCourseId

      public String promptCourseId()
      Prompts the user to enter a course ID.
      Returns:
      the entered course ID

    • checkPermission

      public boolean checkPermission(String permission)
      Checks if the user has the specified permission.
      Parameters:
      permission - the permission to check
      Returns:
      true if the user has the permission, false otherwise

    • getSelectedOption

      public String getSelectedOption(int choice)
      Returns the menu option selected by the user based on their choice.
      Parameters:
      choice - the user's menu choice
      Returns:
      the selected menu option as a string

    • getMenuOptions

      protected abstract List<String> getMenuOptions()
      Returns the menu options specific to this page. Subclasses must implement this method to define their menu options.
      Returns:
      a list of menu option strings

    • handleAction

      protected abstract void handleAction(int choice)
      Handles the action corresponding to the user's menu choice. Subclasses must implement this method to define their specific actions.
      Parameters:
      choice - the user's menu choice

    • getMenuTitle

      protected abstract String getMenuTitle()
      Returns the title of the menu for this page. Subclasses must implement this method to provide a menu title.
      Returns:
      the menu title

    • getLogoutOption

      protected int getLogoutOption()
      Returns the menu option number that corresponds to logging out.
      Returns:
      the logout option number
